Following the received signed renewal offers, while PRL is inline for the landlord’s final approval, we request that you fill out the attached Tenant Info Form for each brand (CH & PRL respectively). Also, it is required to send the below list of legal documents (mentioned on the 2nd page) along with the accomplished forms:

 

1.	Passport Copy with Visa Page & Emirates ID of the Lease Signatory
2.	Trade Name Reservation Certificate& Initial Approval from Abu Dhabi Municipality (If Trade License is not yet obtained for AUH Mall)
3.	Copy of Franchise Agreement or Certificate from the Principal that authorized your company to operate the brand in UAE (if applicable)
4.	If the authorized signatory is not mentioned in the Trade License we need to have any of the following:

	a.	Power of Attorney
	b.	Memorandum of Association (MOA)

5.	Certificate of Tax Group Registration in the United Arab Emirates
6.	Copy of Insurance Policy for Abu Dhabi Mall as follows:

	a.	Third Party Liability Insurance (Coverage not less than 5 Million)
	b.	Property All Risk

7.	Clearance Certificate from the Rental Department for any outstanding (applicable on existing tenants)

 

 

Looking forward to receiving the above soon.

Thank you.

 

 

 

Best regards,

 

Rina Rotairo

Executive Leasing Assistant

Dear Basma, many thanks for sharing the revised offer and we are pleased to confirm a 2 year renewal based on these terms. Please see below our comments on the offer:

 

*	Term of Lease: We would like to include a break-clause option to terminate the lease agreement by serving a 3 month prior notice from expiry of Y1 

 

*	Special Conditions: 

	*	Item 2: Please remove the clause as we will not be renovating the shopfront

 

*	Quarter Rent & Leasing Assistance Fee: these should be paid on signature of the lease agreement, not the offer letter. Additionally, we would kindly request that the “Leasing Assistance Fee” is waived.

 

Thank you for sending through the revised offer and please let me know if you require any further information from our end at this time.

 

Regards, 

 

 

DORIS HAZZAN​​​​

Dear Basma, further to the below and to my discussion with Polo Ralph Lauren, please note we wish to extend the lease for one year, at existing rent. 

 

With reference to Sephora, there are a number of key stakeholders and decision makers on leave for the next few weeks – I expect to have an answer on this by next month realistically.

 

Thanks for your feedback and please let me know if you require any further information from my end in the meantime.


Regards,

 

DORIS HAZZAN​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ LEASING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Doris,

 

Good morning.

 

Following the received signed renewal offers, while PRL is inline for the landlord’s final approval, we request that you fill out the attached Tenant Info Form for each brand (CH & PRL respectively). Also, it is required to send the below list of legal documents (mentioned on the 2nd page) along with the accomplished forms:

 

1.	Passport Copy with Visa Page & Emirates ID of the Lease Signatory
2.	Trade Name Reservation Certificate& Initial Approval from Abu Dhabi Municipality (If Trade License is not yet obtained for AUH Mall)
3.	Copy of Franchise Agreement or Certificate from the Principal that authorized your company to operate the brand in UAE (if applicable)
4.	If the authorized signatory is not mentioned in the Trade License we need to have any of the following:

	a.	Power of Attorney
	b.	Memorandum of Association (MOA)

5.	Certificate of Tax Group Registration in the United Arab Emirates
6.	Copy of Insurance Policy for Abu Dhabi Mall as follows:

	a.	Third Party Liability Insurance (Coverage not less than 5 Million)
	b.	Property All Risk

7.	Clearance Certificate from the Rental Department for any outstanding (applicable on existing tenants)

Dear Basma, many thanks for sharing the revised offer and we are pleased to confirm a 2 year renewal based on these terms. Please see below our comments on the offer:

 

*	Term of Lease: We would like to include a break-clause option to terminate the lease agreement by serving a 3 month prior notice from expiry of Y1 

 

*	Special Conditions: 

	*	Item 2: Please remove the clause as we will not be renovating the shopfront

 

*	Quarter Rent & Leasing Assistance Fee: these should be paid on signature of the lease agreement, not the offer letter. Additionally, we would kindly request that the “Leasing Assistance Fee” is waived.

 

Thank you for sending through the revised offer and please let me know if you require any further information from our end at this time.

 

Regards, 

 

 

DORIS HAZZAN​​​​
